name: The Zeppelin Game
description:
This is The Zeppelin Game + cockpit controller. Me and my children made it during #AltCtrlGameJam - I uploaded a version with keyboard controls:

UP arrow - go up, but you must "pump" the key
LEFT arrow - activate left engine, move right
RIGHT arrow - activate right engine, move left
SPACE - activate/deactivate magnet

You can do the mission (NPCs will tell you) or just look around.
The windows version is untested, contact me if there are any problems!

Here's the trailer/demo video: https://youtu.be/d56h1ODsm20

I documented the project on twitter and vine and a detailed postmortem will follow soon. Have fun exploring this Child art game!

EDIT: I uploaded corrected versions for mac&win with an actually working keyboard input :P

EDIT II: Here's the postmortem: http://blog.finefin.com/news/the-zeppelin-game-alt-ctrl-game-jam-postmortem/
